subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New Messages, [1 Attachment]
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Formal box? These thing are radio based, and static and noise kinda come
with the territroy. Filter out the noise and many of the voices will
probably be lost. There are other methods though,lik eEVPmaker, which works
well for higher spirit contact.

 You might try an external antenan, like C. Crane twin ferrite antenna, you
can also make a homemade  AM loop, it works by by placing the radio inside
tho loop so it has access to higher level signals.

 F-S
